title: S8E07 – "The Unexplored" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three spine-chilling tales from author Nick Carlson, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about astounding arthropods, evolutionary endpoints, and terrifying trials.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
